about_the_game:
Space Gray X is an intense side-scrolling bullet-hell action game that pits you against relentless alien invaders. Begin your crusade on Earth and push your way into the vast reaches of space, determined to eradicate the extraterrestrial threat from our Solar System. As you progress through the game, you'll unlock more advanced aircraft equipped with powerful weaponry, giving you a fighting chance against increasingly formidable enemies. Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled experience as you navigate through waves of bullets, destroy alien ships, and protect humanity from annihilation.



Key Features:

Intense Bullet-Hell Action:

 Experience high-octane gameplay where quick reflexes and strategic maneuvering are crucial to survive relentless enemy fire and massive waves of alien ships.

Epic Journey from Earth to Space:

 Start your mission on Earth and advance through various environments, ultimately reaching the farthest corners of the Solar System to confront the alien menace.

Unlock Advanced Aircraft:

 Progress through the game to unlock new, more powerful aircraft. Each aircraft comes with unique abilities and upgraded weaponry to help you combat tougher enemies.

Challenging Boss Battles:

 Face off against formidable alien bosses at the end of each level. These epic encounters will test your skills and strategy to the limit.

Dynamic and Engaging Levels:

 Navigate through beautifully designed levels that offer both visual appeal and increasing difficulty, ensuring a captivating and challenging gameplay experience.
detailed_description:
Feature List


About the Game



Space Gray X is an intense side-scrolling bullet-hell action game that pits you against relentless alien invaders. Begin your crusade on Earth and push your way into the vast reaches of space, determined to eradicate the extraterrestrial threat from our Solar System. As you progress through the game, you'll unlock more advanced aircraft equipped with powerful weaponry, giving you a fighting chance against increasingly formidable enemies. Prepare for an adrenaline-fueled experience as you navigate through waves of bullets, destroy alien ships, and protect humanity from annihilation.



Key Features:

Intense Bullet-Hell Action:

 Experience high-octane gameplay where quick reflexes and strategic maneuvering are crucial to survive relentless enemy fire and massive waves of alien ships.

Epic Journey from Earth to Space:

 Start your mission on Earth and advance through various environments, ultimately reaching the farthest corners of the Solar System to confront the alien menace.

Unlock Advanced Aircraft:

 Progress through the game to unlock new, more powerful aircraft. Each aircraft comes with unique abilities and upgraded weaponry to help you combat tougher enemies.

Challenging Boss Battles:

 Face off against formidable alien bosses at the end of each level. These epic encounters will test your skills and strategy to the limit.

Dynamic and Engaging Levels:

 Navigate through beautifully designed levels that offer both visual appeal and increasing difficulty, ensuring a captivating and challenging gameplay experience.
name: Space Gray X

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 8 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 2.0 GHz Dual Core Processor
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated Graphics (512MB)
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64 Bit)
  • Processor: 3.0GHz i5 Dual Core or equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 650 Radeon HD 3600 (1GB)
  • Storage: 170 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Additional Notes: Requires a system running DirectX 11 as a minimum. Graphics cards over 10 years old may find some graphics display issues. Unsupported video chipsets: Intel HD Graphics 3000, Intel GMA X3100, Intel GMA 950.

short_description: Space Gray X is a side-scrolling bullet-hell action game where you battle alien invaders, starting from Earth and advancing into space, unlocking advanced aircraft to aid your mission.
